column1: Little Goat Diner////The pork belly home fries we ordered were super crispy on the outside yet creamy on the inside. The pork belly itself was kind of like thick cut bacon
column2: but with an incredible crunchy texture - I wish they were more generous with their portions! The whole pile was drizzled with tangy
column3: creamy mayo and garnished with parsley and sliced banana peppers.
